guide.title: Gentoo 2007.0 Networkless Handbook
guide.abstract: The Gentoo 2007.0 Networkless Handbook is an effort to centralize documentation into a coherent handbook. It contains the networkless installation instructions for the 2007.0 release and parts on working with Gentoo and Portage.

body.p: The Gentoo Linux 2007.0 Networkless Handbook is available in the following languages:
English | Indonesian | Italian | Polish | Simplified Chinese

Welcome to the Gentoo Linux 2007.0 Networkless Handbooks. These handbooks are released together with the Gentoo Linux releases and contain the necessary installation instructions to install Gentoo Linux 2007.0 without an internet connection.
However, if you want to install Gentoo Linux using the latest versions of all available packages, please use the Installation Instructions in the Gentoo Linux Handbook for your architecture.
